us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface BoundingBox2DBasics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BoundingBox2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundingBox2D

    public interface BoundingBox2DBasics
extends BoundingBox2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable
    Write and read interface for a 2D axis-aligned bounding box defined from a set of minimum and maximum coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void combine(BoundingBox2DReadOnly other)
      Combines this bounding box with other such that it becomes the smallest bounding box containing this and other.
      default void combine(BoundingBox2DReadOnly boundingBoxOne, BoundingBox2DReadOnly boundingBoxTwo)
      Sets this bounding box to the union of boundingBoxOne and boundingBoxTwo.
      default boolean containsNaN()
      Tests if the min and max points defining this bounding box contain at least one Double.NaN.
      us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics getMaxPoint()
      Gets the reference to the maximum coordinate of this bounding box.
      us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics getMinPoint()
      Gets the reference to the minimum coordinate of this bounding box.
      default void set(BoundingBox2DReadOnly other)
      Redefines this bounding box to be the same as the given other.
      default void set(double[] min, double[] max)
      Redefines this bounding box with new minimum and maximum coordinates.
      default void set(double minX, double minY, double maxX, double maxY)
      Redefines this bounding box with new minimum and maximum coordinates.
      default void set(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly min, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly max)
      Redefines this bounding box with new minimum and maximum coordinates.
      default void set(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly center, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Vector2DReadOnly halfSize)
      Redefines this bounding box given its center location and half its size along each axis halfSize.
      default void setMax(double[] max)
      Sets the maximum coordinate of this bounding box.

      Sets the maximum coordinate of this bounding box.

      Sets the maximum coordinate of this bounding box.
      default void setMin(double[] min)
      Sets the minimum coordinate of this bounding box.
      default void setMin(double minX, double minY)
      Sets the minimum coordinate of this bounding box.
      default void setMin(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly min)
      Sets the minimum coordinate of this bounding box.
      default void setToNaN()
      Invalidates this bounding box by setting all its coordinates to Double.NaN.
      default void setToZero()
      Resets this bounding box by setting both its minimum and maximum coordinates to (0, 0).
      default void updateToIncludePoint(double x, double y)
      Updates this bounding box to be the smallest bounding box that includes this and the given point.

      Updates this bounding box to be the smallest bounding box that includes this and the given point.
      default void updateToIncludePoints(Vertex2DSupplier vertex2DSupplier)
      Updates this bounding box to be the smallest bounding box that includes this and the supplied points.

      • setMin

        default void setMin(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly min)
        Sets the minimum coordinate of this bounding box.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum coordinate for this bounding box. Not modified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if any of the minimum coordinates is strictly greater than the maximum coordinate on the same axis.

      • set

        Redefines this bounding box to be the same as the given other.
        Parameters:

      • combine

        default void combine(BoundingBox2DReadOnly other)
        Combines this bounding box with other such that it becomes the smallest bounding box containing this and other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other bounding box to combine with this. Not modified.

      • combine

        default void combine(BoundingBox2DReadOnly boundingBoxOne,
                     BoundingBox2DReadOnly boundingBoxTwo)
        Sets this bounding box to the union of boundingBoxOne and boundingBoxTwo.

        This bounding box is set such that it is the smallest bounding box containing the two given bounding boxes.

        Parameters:
        boundingBoxOne - the first bounding box. Can be the same instance as this. Not modified.
        boundingBoxTwo - the second bounding box. Can be the same instance as this. Not modified.

      • setToNaN

        default void setToNaN()
        Invalidates this bounding box by setting all its coordinates to Double.NaN.
        Specified by:

        default void setToZero()

      • updateToIncludePoint

        Updates this bounding box to be the smallest bounding box that includes this and the given point.
        Parameters:

      • updateToIncludePoint

                                  double y)
        Updates this bounding box to be the smallest bounding box that includes this and the given point.
        Parameters:
